item.title: Wolfgang Huber new co-director of the MMPU
item.description:
Wolfgang Huber was elected co-director of the Molecular Medicine Partnership Unit (MMPU) between EMBL and Heidelberg University Hospital and started in his new role on 1 January 2022.

In addition, he jointly heads the research group Systems Medicine of Cancer Drugs with Sascha Dietrich.
